burn(uint256).details: Destroys `amount` tokens from the caller. See {ERC20-_burn}.

burnFrom(address,uint256).details: Destroys `amount` tokens from `account`, deducting from the caller's allowance. See {ERC20-_burn} and {ERC20-allowance}. Requirements: - the caller must have allowance for ``accounts``'s tokens of at least `amount`.
